(Armor Negating [armornegating], Size negates (bugged, is never checked) [fivegates], Magic weapon [magic], Strength not added to damage [nostr])

Requires 5D5S to forge (D1S1)

A slim dagger made of darkened steel, it is crafted according to methods long used by the Wolfkin of Jotun. It is unnaturally sharp and anyone cut by its razor edges will bleed profusely. The blade's supernatural sharpness also allows it to bypass any armor.
